attributes.action: All High school and sixth form students should get a free Ipad 2
attributes.additional_details:
We all need one, its vital for our studies. Those schools that already have this scheme in place are exceeding national averages and are on track of getting the UK out of recession. With Ipads we can have a live link with teachers, hold online revision sessions, it opens a world of possibilities for students as well as teachers. It reduces the need to use paper, and teachers can trace and monitor data.

its environmentally friendly, and its the way forward for britain
